Navigation
Name Rascal/Expressions/Values/Number/Multiplication
Synopsis Multiply two numeric values.
Syntax Exp1 * Exp2
Types
Exp1 Exp2 Exp1 * Exp2
int int int
int real real
real real real
Description Yields the result of multiplying the values of Exp1 and Exp2.
Examples 
rascal>12 * 13
int: 156
rascal>12 * 13.5
real: 162.00
rascal>-12*13
int: -156

Questions
Question [1].
The type of -5 * 2 is

Question [2].
The type of 6 * 3.89549263138854000 is

Question [3].
The type of -5.024674715417014800 * 9 is

Question [4]. 
-10 * 7.58033691417935600 ==
